resources.string: "This application uses the AudD® service as a Music Recognition API. You need a special API token provided by AudD® to use the application. If you don\'t have one, you can sign up for a free API token "
TuneSurfer is the music recognizing application, that can help you quickly and accurately recognize a music track playing nearby you.

The application requires permission to record audio in order to work properly. By enabling this permission, you agree that your recorded data will be used by remote servers for music recognition. The application does not use this data for any other purpose.
You have denied permission request multiple times. You can change your decision in the application settings.\nWould you like to open settings?
Allow to control recognition from notifications
An error occurred while recording the audio. Please, check app permission to access the microphone and retry.
Internet connection is not available. Please, check your network status and retry.
An error occurred during internet request. Please, try again.
The limit of current API token was reached. Please, set a proper token in the app preferences and retry.
An internal error occurred. Please, try again.
Wrong API token. Please, set a proper token in the app preferences and retry.
